achievements: First woman to be elected to the Académie Française
Known for her novels including 'Memoirs of Hadrian'
Won the Prix Goncourt for her novel 'The Lover'
Directed acclaimed films such as 'India Song'

occupation: Nun, founder of the Congregation of Notre-Dame de Montréal
achievements: Canonized as a saint by the Roman Catholic Church in 1982
Founded schools for girls and provided education to marginalized communities in New France
